mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet_transaction_info(wtx_id, order_id, wallet_id, wtx_amount, wtx_status, wtx_type, wtx_channel, wtx_extension_id) VALUES(#{wtxId}, #{orderId}, #{walletId}, #{wtxAmount}, #{wtxStatus}, #{wtxType}, #{wtxChannel}, #{wtxExtensionId})

INSERT INTO wallet_transaction_info(wtx_id, order_id, wallet_id, wtx_amount, wtx_status, wtx_type, wtx_channel, wtx_extension_id) SELECT wtx_id, order_id, wallet_id, wtx_amount, wtx_status, wtx_type, wtx_channel, wtx_extension_id FROM wallet_transaction_pool WHERE wtx_id = #{wtxId}
mapper.select: SELECT wtx_id, order_id, wallet_id, wtx_amount, wallet_balance_his, wtx_status, wtx_type, wtx_channel, wtx_extension_id, c_time FROM wallet_transaction_info WHERE wallet_id = #{walletId} AND wtx_status = 3 ORDER BY c_time DESC
